Tag_Youmay.description: the memory of Kassandra | the [[Proktos the Moon King | mercenary]]

Tag_Imageneed.description: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — [[Legacy of the First Blade]]

MemoryInfobox.description: 'The Tempest sent two Mercenary|mercenaries to patrol Boura in search of the Eagle Bearer. But facing two mercenaries at the same time was a challenge from which Kassandra would not back down.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage'

General_Description: '''Proktos the Moon King''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra tracked down [[Proktos the Moon King]], one of the [[Mercenary|mercenaries]] sent by the [[Phila|Tempest]] to eliminate her.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra travelled to the [[Boura]], finding Proktos along with [[Kephalon the Thinker]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Another one of the Tempest's hired hands.''
Kassandra eliminated the mercenary.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and eliminated Proktos the Moon King.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage]]''
